properties.script:
import sys
import re

# Extract the HTML of the blog post
search_text = sys.argv[1]


# Strip <script /> tags
search_text = re.sub(r'<script\b[^<]*(?:(?!<\/script>)<[^<]*)*<\/script>', '', str(search_text), flags=re.DOTALL)

# Strip <style /> tags
search_text = re.sub(r'<style\b[^<]*(?:(?!<\/style>)<[^<]*)*<\/style>', '', search_text, flags=re.DOTALL)

# Strip other HTML
search_text = re.sub(r'<[^<]+?>', '', search_text, flags=re.DOTALL)

# Replace new lines with a space
search_text = search_text.replace("\n", " ")
# Replace carrage retrun with a space
search_text = search_text.replace("\r", " ")

properties.description: Target used to invoke iroh endpoints

properties.script:
import email
import getpass, imaplib
import os
import sys
import base64
import requests

subject = sys.argv[1]
userName = sys.argv[2]
passwd = sys.argv[3]
attach = []
text_output = ''
try:
    imapSession = imaplib.IMAP4_SSL(sys.argv[4])
    typ, accountDetails = imapSession.login(userName, passwd)
    if typ != 'OK':
        print('Not able to sign in!')

    imapSession.select('Inbox')
    typ, data = imapSession.search(None, '(SUBJECT "' + subject + '")')
    if typ != 'OK':
        print('Error searching Inbox.')

    # Iterating over all emails
    for msgId in data[0].split():
        msg_id = msgId.decode()
        #if msg_id_decoded != msg_id:
        #    continue
        typ, messageParts = imapSession.fetch(msg_id, '(RFC822)')
        if typ != 'OK':
            print('Error fetching mail.')

        emailBody = messageParts[0][1].decode("utf-8")
        mail = email.message_from_string(emailBody)
        for part in mail.walk():
            if part.get_content_maintype() == 'multipart':
                # print part.as_string()
                continue
            if part.get('Content-Disposition') is None:
                # print part.as_string()
                continue
            fileName = part.get_filename()
            if '.pdf' in fileName:
                attach.append(part.get_payload(decode=True))
    imapSession.close()
    imapSession.logout()
except:
    print('Not able to download all attachments.')
for a in attach:
    encoded_string = base64.b64encode(a)
    url = "https://api.ocr.space/parse/image"

    payload = {'language': 'eng',
               'isOverlayRequired': 'false',
               'base64Image': 'data:application/pdf;base64,' + encoded_string.decode(),
               'iscreatesearchablepdf': 'false',
               'issearchablepdfhidetextlayer': 'false'}
    files = [

    ]
    headers = {
        'apikey': sys.argv[4]
    }

    response = requests.request("POST", url, headers=headers, data=payload, files=files)
    data = response.json()
    if response.status_code == 200:
        if 'ParsedResults' in data.keys():
            for text in data['ParsedResults']:
                text_output += text['ParsedText'] + '/r/n'
